values: While the Oe..oekai..Oacai.. whatever the hell you call it is clean, the site itself (should you attempt to backtrack) is not. Tis a doodle of Amy Rose, pointing. Angrily, I guess. Drew whatever came to mind. D:

Massive work-sketchdump! Mostly random stuff, due to lack of music most of the time. I am hard govurmint workor. :B Wolf and A'ru lined up really odd there, completely unintentional. KID!ELA IS VASTLY AMUSING. A'ru is my male Lopunny AND I LOVE HIM SO. :B Game ideas. Tutorial stage concept. Coming up with some sort of dress that wouldn't mess with the wings -or- the tail. Little project: Yeah, got a tiny notebook thing not really worth writing notes in, so I set off to fill all the sheets with strictly pen drawings. It was really hit or miss. Some ideas were made near the same time as the previous stuff, so there's some overlap. Hit Hit MISS Hit Hit Miss Hit Hit Hit Hit Hit Hit Miss HIT OF AWESOME Hit Miss Hit Hit Miss Hit Miss Bull's Eye Miss (coding something like "function properly OR ELSE" joke) Miss Miss Hit Hit (in a wierd way) Hit Miss Hit Miss Hit Miiiiiiss Miss Hit Hit Hit Hit WALL OF TEXT WALL OF TEXT WALL OF TEXT Hit Hit Way hit Hit Miss Miss Miss Hit Hit Hit Hit Hit Uploading all that took a whole day. Hope some of that was vaguely interesting.

Because they've been overdue for designing. It's sad that the whole reason I wanted to remake the two was for Rilwur, but Paraphi actually got an upgrade and made more of a character. Figures. D: I should really stop using the time waiting for sleeping meds to work as drawing time. It always comes out... wierd. I think I was trying to do perspective, but it's all tangly and I can't tell. XD; Still have no idea what to do for shoes, hardest part of design for me. Then I actually did a short lookup on real mongoose markings. It seems that Mongeese actually have the same wierd eyes that goats do. (Couldn't help but wonder how OC would think of that, her hating on Mina and all.) And long pointy muzzle. It's awquard. Her hair is about where I want it, frazzly, but pinned up nicely at the same time. The uniform design for Celestial Enforces hasn't changed, I just got better at drawing it. :P PARAPHI. Had to come up with something for his head since it was just kind of "*facepalm* He's a snake, he wouldn't have -hair-." The draped cloth came from staring at the Mass Effect art book, then worked out from there. Desert-y snake, nomadic, hates the snot out of anything dealing with angels or demons (celestic). That's just a fun idea, having the same fervor that our religions have for some god's cause, but to get rid of whatever that will is instead. Haven't picked out his markings yet, but it'll be likely very simple, but having the cloth be complex. Paraphi is notably younger than Rilwur, and he's a bit more oblivious when not in combat mentality. Myes. And the whole reason to start was Nemesis by VNV Nation. As I had hoped for new music, inspiration was nice. The phrase "Judgement day's not coming soon enough" is just so fitting for the focus of the Celestial Enforcers.

Hey ho, more badges. At least, that's the best guess as to what these 'are.' Lessie what's special about this collection. I believe it's the first uploaded picture of my semi-universal ZOMGHUMAN character, Teca. Hrebik is the Captain, he let me make a fursona for him. ^^;; It's mostly in chronological order, save for the very last one of the creature which was done before the Battery and Teca set. And that full body picture of Huegitu is craaaap. ;--; And and... Trying to break out of drawing characters all naked. (The anatomy is fun..! Dun wanna cover it up ;.;)

And the next round of badges, most of which came out terribly. Out of the eight drawn, four came out so it works anyways. ^^; Blade, CS, Joslyn (Snazzard), Calli 128. And I went ahead and colored on Blade because he's just "Rawr I'm absence of light except for my freaky-but-easy-to-color eyes." Lack markings for CS and Calli too, but if I go back and clean 'em up they'll show up. D; Again, fun stuff.
I did badgey thingies! So like, free fanart for people! Notecards a gogo! You know who you are! *tumbles over to sleep*

COLORS, but nothing for sake of finishing. I keep hearing 'badge' as some art style, and I -think- that's what it's supposed to be. Character and name, usually a bust? (I should outline the rules for my fursona sometime, just in case someone might actually do fanart or something o_O) Just some messing around in colors. From a batch of scans to finish out '07 with, but most were crap so you don't have to burn your eyes with them. :D Well, maybe I'll resize the one's that involve other people's characters so Photobucket won't explode. *shrug* o.o

Yeah, ITSY BITSY resize as photobucket is picky on filesize and all other compression options imploded from the gradient. Took a second screenshot and just cropped out some of the fun bit so I could keep it uncompressed. I liked the way I remade the bullet holes, and now a really simplistic design. (Though those green line vectors took almost an hour to do...) When all is said and done, the stylized stuff doesn't fit either. Be nicer if he was actually standing on something... May redo it again when I feel like messing around with layers and effects some more. Didn't get my blood spatter idea to work either, doing it with a straight mouse is dificil. (No, I'm not going to use brushes. I'll use them when I can do them myself first.) Mreh. At least I have something considerably less freaky than my previous two wallpapers: http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v605/Temika_works/Desktop10062007.jpg http://www.missmab.com/DLoads/DMFA_Wallpaper28_1280.jpg

Art slumps are frustrating, but nice gems seem to be what kicks me out of them. Only really worked on one, as it just begged to get a BG. The pose just begged to be done as I was listening to dis song. *points upwards* Slate, one of the two main characters of Tyler's. Originally a faint blue pencil sketch with fine inking on the edges and filled in with a brush pen. Just kinda had the need for a lot of ink, ya? As a stand alone piece in the sketchbook, I love it. It was fun to work on and it looks nice. CG, not so much. Just screwing around with brushes and effects and junk. Logging how I did the 'splosion clouds and jet trails, the rest is pretty bleh. Kinda said I'd make a wallpaper from it, so I'll be remaking the background soon. Definitely going to shoot for lighter colors, all too much dark with not enough contrast on this try. Blood spatters are corny, yeah, but I'd like to get them right. Not going to change the inkwork as I am super happy with it.

Ahhh, bugger all. Arg, it's such a nice drawing, but I can't get decent color on it as it's on notebook papers. 3: All that decent blending shading just stuck there. MUSCLE ARMS, but pretty frail and whispy otherwise, makes sense so he can actually fly with less handwaving than other characters. :| Tie-around shirt for that reason too, bah I put too much thought into everything as I go. (...do need to sit and rethink the arm's bone structure though, I know what I want and how but haven't gotten the layout set up.) Yes, I fail at 'real' CGing because I do everything piecewise instead of painting it all at once. Pretty much a request for a not-so-creative forumer to make a fursona for him. He -insisted- that he have a gun, and gave a list of rifles. Ulg, that M4 has been the bane of my existance because it doesn't look right if you simplify it in any way. I traced it over three times, so it's pretty much a cop out. DODGE/BURN/SMUDGE IS STILL MY FRIEND. Hum hum, For all the pessimistic rantlings, I really like both of them. Feh, oh well. :B
Cross-post, go! Yeah, thas all I got. I needs to get me some Flash if I wanna animate correctly.

Actually, no one talks to me, so I can't get teased. :3 Kate! :D Also, loath-age on 'fellow' females. STUFF! Mutant!TechCat attacking NaCl is memorable. :3 Hay, guess what?! I started off going "ha ha, I'm going to draw naughty stuff" to "Ha ha, I can't be naughty seriously." I must do a full picture of the panty shot. MUST. Also more misc stuff. Snazzard tail is fun, for serious. BATTERY PERSPECTIVE WIN, but I still am crap at drawin' her head normally. :D SQUIRREL! And more misc stuff. Bonus if you can name the kid following Shadow. :D (especially since, y'know, there were no picture of him uploaded, I think.) I AM SUCH A MEANIE. Clav, 'cause she's... fun to work with. I'm not a sadist I SWEAR. c_C;;; "If anyone is going to destroy my innocence, I'd rather it be me." Started a ref sheet for Clav, and it kinda lost momentum. Must try again at another time... MISTARH OH DONNEHLL. I entertain the notion that the 'eyepatch' is a cover/amplifier for the actual cybernetic eye. As he can't really 'turn off' the most basic functions of the thing, it's reeeally hard for him to sleep, hence the insomnia. But he's fun to draw sleeping, 'cause he'd be so mother f'in tired to tune out that perpetual processing. Also, BEEFY. <3 MISC. Also, I have gotten out of practive with Mobian stuff, top left was s'possed to be Alex's mom but iiiit flopped. Mutant!Teca trying to stay on a sphere, 'cause it was an amusing thought. Goutari are still fun to design. HEY LOOK A BUTT!!1 Also, scorpion chick design thing that just HAPPENED. I DUNNO, IT WAS FUN. I KNOW IT DOESN'T MAKE SENSE. D: THASSALL. *continues attempting to mind-force tablet into working properly*

Figures are always so fun, can't help it if the female body is so... artistically satisfying. Am I alone in thinking a good figure/pose is always sexier than whatever is on it (ie. boobs)? Used TechCat's fur colors as they were still in my palette. Started 'cause I wanted to do a simplified female figure and see if I could get good edges without lines again. Fun tablet practice, basically. Then again, why would anyone do random practice when it's not enjoyable? Mmmhmm *wills tablet to function for larger picture in progress*

Bless this tablet, bless it good. *nuzzles it* Some perspective worked like I wanted it to! OMG yay. |3 Scene inspired by Madman's Dream by Assemblage 23; though the idea itself has nothing to do with Hurricane Katrina, the societal discord from a naturally destroyed city is about the same. CLAV, gawd I love her... him. Clav's got a bit of story behind her. Mwa ha haa~ I'll go nuts in a refrence sheet and rant about it all there. Only problem I have in my face here is making buildings around her. The mad perspective is going to make it wonky, so I'll likely end up redrawing them many many times before it gets close to right. >_> But wheee, good sketches with emotion always make me feel good. :3

Ryan's tablet came in yesterday. <3 Wheeeeeeeeeee~~ I still say many thank yous. And now for something I did just to get used to tablet-y-ness again. HA HA HAAA! Elananin pinup wallpaper THINGY. Eyes are messed up somehow, think they're pointing the wrong way or something. "quick" thing, considering it took three hours... But eh. It was fun. Supposed to be looking down, but perspective is fail as always. BOOBIES XD

Yeah... These two were drawn at about the same time, just for the sake of wanting to try out some things on them. Top one will likely to inked, just to try out my new pen. Bottom was just, SOMETHIN' CUTE. Mini Still Light with... some kind of flower that just kind of... happened. Gonna try and play with it in PSP8 after seeing Orin's little CGing procession. But yay, SL's markings are still woah fun.

I dunno why I seem to think anyone wants to see these works in progress, but eh. I'm workin on it, yeah. 8 layers currently, just trying to keep everything in order. I dunno what coloring 'style' I have, but I enjoy it~ :D Edit: And now 11 layers, all the color frames down. Not the final colors yet, but woo I just lock transparency and fiddle around from here. Hard part is over. :D I would also like to mention that this image is 25% actual image size.

Yeah, I wanted to do more of it. Gave a shot at 'tracing' the pose on the comp afterwards to get a better visual tool for the other artists out there. ^^; My sketch bases tend to be really simple and blobby, and using only a mouse only made it worse. 1) : 2) : 3) : 4) : 5) : 6) : 7) : 8) : Yes, I can readily admit I'm not the skinniest thing in the world. Chub comes and goes, still at a healthy body-fat ratio. *shrug* There were many other pictures taken that day, but I didn't want to overload the entry so I'll split 'em up based on the type of pose. :3 Had I more control of the mouse, I would have shot a bit more for sketching out the rail I'm leaning on as well, as I know that's a rough part to draw, as a matter of perspective at least. Still think this is a better way to step up the differences between random photos and drawing the poses in them. Love to hear your input, like or dislike.

Humor with Zelda, then stuff for Nothing To Hide. I know you all know the song. This would be fun to do for a flash or something, but otherwise crap doodles. :p The one with hands clasped over themselves and listening is meant to be Crossword as she's the public relations person for Nothing To Hide. Meant to be a profile sort of dealie, each one is sitting on the same shape of 'bench', I are lazy and no draw it, dur hur. Even more durhur is the misspellings. Ha ha, I misspelt Terrorist. Alright, and aside from just commenting on the pictures, I cracked up the contrast on these to make them a bit clearer on the monitor. Like to know if it works alright, seems a bit apprasive to me but the planning picture was practicly invisible beforehand. x.x

Really enjoy posing myself (helps me figure out poses for characters too), and Tyler became my photographer for a day. I'd like to do more things like this, but we'll see. Ok, here we go. Just some shots I selected out of the bunch that I really liked... I didn't really notice I was exposing so much leg, but the curves show through fine and it's not showing too much. Really really enjoy that dress. Got it for thirty bucks at our local oriental shop a good year and a half ago. 1) 2) 3) 4) 5) 6) And then, a picture from my Halloween costume, it's pretty bleh as far as pictures go. Feedback appreciated, not quite sure if I should make this a regular thing (maybe doing poses outside and such).

I suck and don't color much :3 First up, we have Crossword. She came about completely from Calli's recent character design (http://www.deviantart.com/deviation/46752133/), in which one of the spots on the tail looked like a puzzle piece. Ideas landslide from there. ^^; Tends to be that way. Best part about her focus on 'puzzling' things is that she's very open and has no dirty secrets. In ur face, cliches! Also, she's going to be the secretary/public relations person for Nothing To Hide. Shanir "Shell" Toquan, my armadillo babeh. Debating wether or not to make him a ghost or not. Terrorist with fuzzstache. <3 First round of ideas for Ryan's Self-insert chimera idea. Clouded Leopard and Fennec for the main heads, some reptile for the tail. Really like the idea of the Fennec (who is devoid of markings, naturally) to have the mole on the cheek like Ryan does, I've always forgotten that in his pictors. Round two. Still very fun. Elbow wing was very fun to do, he requested some scale detail for the elbows and I added a bit more. I do get tired of dirty looks. -_- Feet continue to give difficulty, big change from bubble feet of Sonic-ness. Thanks for stoping by.

Yeah, I put in the shadow eye on the computer, I couldn't resist it. Don't really want to color everything because I think it would take away from the linework. It's really nice on it's own, even through I do see a few flaws I made. Took many hours to fiddle with the linewieghts like that, but it came out nifty. And, again, I do not support drug use. It's showing her character as a manipulative drug dealer. DA is terrible at uploading the images now. I gave it eight tries and I think I'm just going to give up until the next buld actually works.

I'll title it "Just let the machine get it" Dedicated to Assemblage 23's song 30KFT. The most powerful song I have ever heard. Put(ting) lots of thought and ideas to make it a very simple middle-class family. I've wanted to do an image that would do some justice to this song, it's amazingly beautiful if very very painful. On a less induced scale, Kate. Our little shadow character likes to play the drug dealer to bring people to their wit's end easily and quickly. This drawing was meant more to show her personality, classy but still digging into the darker parts of society. Inking project for some techniques one of the guys at the new forum and I were talking about. It'll be a while before it's done. The showing part of her Shadow 'side' is pretty fun too. (Though technically she's always a Shadow, just disgusing herself the majority of the time.) No I do not endorse drug use in any non-medical way. -.-; Fun stuff. *returns to coloring fursona sketches*

Throwing out some of the minis for the Shut-Up And Smile picture. Wave looks like crap. D: Going to try and do every last character I know, may PM/e-mail some of you people about using your characters. Wold O'Donnell nodding off a bit. No, he won't be staying naked, but I may not give him a shirt since his chest came out alright. Trying to get better with beffy-ness, does look a little wonky. And now for something really pretty! God, I'm loving those eyes. I haven't even finished her base colors and it still looks beautiful. Damn I love it when that happens. Happy happy happy with this picture. Working strictly with amouse is a little odd, but I'm getting used to it again.

On a side note, I colored a simple mini of myself and put it on DA: http://www.deviantart.com/deviation/43765264/ I concur that the new uploading system is shit. *salutes* Ajina the Critter, seeing if I can get back into her a bit. Need a little more work. Zellchaver, still pretty in tune to him. Trying to remember what details he had in SAZ that I normally don't draw him with. Slate was feeling left out. Also, I could not help but fall asleep five times in that one hour of Chem. Ahhh, such a bad student. SPOILER AHEAD Gotit? D: 'Kursed', Krystal when she abandons all her life and becomes a bounty hunter. I rembered the top, but not so much of the bottom she had. Refrenceless, I continued to sketch anyways. I should go back and look at the picture before I fool around with the design much more. I liked toying around with the ideas, but I like doing that most of the time anyways. :D Also, Flaco being a parrot for Wolf, eyepatch -> pirate :D (Though I play with it more as an implant at this point but~) I suck at drawing guns! Woo! Some more Wolf, because he's very awesome. I've concluded that he's an insomniac, poor guy. I have ideas to write a quick little adapt of when Krystal joins StarWolf, so some ideas float around. Want a new sketchbook p_q
Late night idea, drawn today. I need to carry a ruler around with me... I made a spacing error, but I'll prolly re-draw this if I want to make a polished version. Hee hee.

Unfortunately, the PMS thing does prove true but for me. During theese generally sucky weeks, I tend to flow back and forth between giddiness and depression. This was obviously during the latter, but a question came through my mind as I was was thinking back to all my instances (while pondering going to a psychologist or not). Can God even accept me into heaven anymore? I do not wish to get some pity posts, let alone any advice on the matter presented. I did this picture to show my contemplation, and for a fairly quick drawing it came out decently. Also could be used as a bit of refrence for the TMI comic, but that requires more practice I'm not willing/able to do now.

Pretties will be saved for last, dangit. First we have a mini comic featuring Slate and Wolf, used this to keep my spirits up and people were wondering why I was quietly laughing to myself. Oh well. Oh, and some guy in my class did the thing in the corner, don't know what's up with that. New character alert! Weeoo! Weeoo! She doesn't care to remember her last name and is a Shadow as is, but of a high enough rank to be a mild assassin. Same character, done today to show her outfit a bit better. It's simple. BUTTONS. And some back story, but Photobucket wouldn't let it be big enough to make it readable. And now pretties. :D OMG pretties. Wheeeee. Scan ended up making the brighter parts darken, but wheeee it's pretty and I feel accomplished. Wolf O'Donnell from Star Fox, biznach.

I have a lot of unfinished stuff, don't I? Oh welly, I tend to like seeing other artists' sketches to see how they piece stuff together. Some busts of a few characters. Especially like how Twilight's muzzle came out. It's such a bitch to get bats to look right. Sadly that is about the same as the conversation. Wolf O'Donnell, supposed to be on a workout bench. Need Tyler to pose for me with one of his guns so I can get that to work right. Bloody guns and thier damned grips. Wolf likes shorts! He commented about my mental dancing. Wolf is still awesome, I'm still withholding an absolutely superb picture I did of him as bait for Tyler. Mwa ha ha haa~

So, last night I was wiki-ing StarFox and talking about stuff with Tyler. And it was awesome thinking about all the little details I had never really cared about. Also, I read through the whole of the StarFox comics that were in Nintendo Power for... I think '92. I may go back and read the '97 and '02 ones sometime. It was intriguing. And I was like "BITCH I can do an awesome Vixy Reinard!" Thus a family portrait came up in my mind. James and Vixy, with a kid-Fox. I find it very interesting that they were never married. The muzzles look so damn good! And Fox is chubby like a real tot would be! OMG it makes me happy! I want to clean it up more, maybe shade it and color it! IT WILL BE AWESOME. Yes, I can't get over when something comes out really well right after I make it. :D Now to tackle Wolf and his masive manlyness...

First up, notebook doodles! Starting with Math, going backwards, datewise since I'm lazy. Lust and Guttony IN ACTION. Gluttony head stuff. Working witha beak is something I wanna get used to. And these two go together. Slate and Blade, after I was through with Slate. :D I believe the avtar featuring such a figure was on my mind. It made me laugh in class. Stalker chick! And "real polar bear" comic layout. ROFL, I suck at drawing animals. Members of Nothing To Hide, all shadow-y. With Comfort Eagle lyrics, cause inspiration. OR SOMETHING. :D LEIK WAOH! It's Roq's character. And the muffle, and some cheese. Win. Random stuff! Real life friends, holy crap yes they do exist. I like the Clint mini like woah. Snore~ Oh noes, being angry and stuff. :O A little Zell head, it looks pretty good. My Calc teacher showing his dislike of calculators. And now on to... *rumages* Chem! I do random shit with pens. Didn't have my pencil. I'm not one to 'pen sketch', random stuff just happens :P Ryan's already seen this, but oh well, why not? Battery, mini and body shape thingy. She's supposed to be fairly tall. Yay rock fingers. A small doodle of Slate, with a shotgun of some sort. Ended up putting more work into it than normal. Silly scene details. Joslyn Snazzard! No, she will not be turned into a naga like that, it just popped in my head and she was like "Wut?" And now, PHILOSOPHY! We'll go in the right order this time. First page, first day. :D Some of the first real headway in concepts for Tyler's character design. I love those messed up markings so muchly. Ninja! Yes, this was on Halloween. Some concepts for Joslyn's past. No, I wasn't depressed at the time I was finding it facinating. And, now onto the sketchbook! D: D: D: Still going to go backwards. Starting with today! Random minis, yeah. Zell and Slate STILL competing, ha ha. Shanir Toqan is my armadillo babeh. Considering he was never really made to be anything, he's pretty much defined himself. Don't take no shit! It's hard to draw angry, at least for me. Yes, I do want to do a comic with Tyler and I. It'd be a good way to counter what every damn porn thing seems to think about relationships involving sex. Obviously just a concept for a logo-y thing. Still today. Some semi-depressing stuff, but not overbearingly so. And some random try-out stuff. "*sigh* times are tough". Just sketching outstuff to get it off me. Some might have seen the minis on DA, but it was originally just Joslyn there. The two are in no way related. Joslyn was calming explaining why she just doesn't like males. Sha came out quite well. The mini Slate and Blade was from the conversation with Tyler about the picture. Page of doodles. May do something with the self portrait from the back I inked. I just like how the curves are. And other stuff. Lust and Pride, he apparently came in just a short bit ago. There are some sin character notes underneath, but they're fairly unimportant. Joslyn and her girlfriend, Elananin (Ela for short). Notes on the side explain everything. 'Pawns'a different kind of 'chibi' somewhat inpired by VG Cats, but not directly. Also a small sketch of Tyler. WHat was to be my original Haloween picture, but I didn't feel like finishing it. Blade had vast amounts of influence with this one, but I think it looks sweet. Hopefully I'll be able to come back to it one day and do it. Oh my, what do we have here? An attempt at a decent human face? With Battery? My my my. Cute is so much more my forte. Also, maybe I'll be against most Furries and be micro. Ha ha! Rampaging on my own desk would be awesome. I got the phrase "don't piss off the lizard thing" refering to Snazzard for some reason, and thought of Ruri and Hari from Wish. And Joslyn has not 'titties'. Lizard, why would she? See? Micro is very cute. <3 Being cute is awesome. Tried fairly hard on this one. Be really fun to CG, close up of fur! Ha ha ha! some good stuff and some random stuff. Started with our fox soldier, and it just branched out. Tails in a taco! Slate in a dress! Marking designs for self, but those aren't as interesting. Because we love design tweaks. Getting some reptile bits into my feline self. Not much, but it adds a bit of individuality. Guild Wars Halloween stuff, never finished so I didn't enter the contest. Layout idea, inspired by Own Little World by Celldweller. Love that song to pieces. Having the Saviors to work with makes it interesting. Wings FTW. A profile thingy for Still Light. The profile styler for al the members of Nothing To Hide screeched to a halt after the first. Such a bugger when that happens. But <3 to markings. Blade and Slate turned into Mobians. And ensuing beatings. Gotta love thier priorities. Yes, I suck at pannels. Joslyn, saluting. An attempt to draw from two perspectives simultanously. It was all kninds of awquard. Possibly a first comic for TMI, at least concept-wise. I'd probably redraw it to some format. Again, bad panneling. Full page of stuff. The model things are for Tyler, since he's playing around with 3D programs and he wasn't to model some stuff that I make. Also, fiddling with Tyler's design. And to finish off, bringing us about the same place as the last dump, is Xauna. Fiddled with the goggle design and used a bit more off-hand cat speices to have fluffies. Because I'm a fan of fluffies and I think it adds an interesting aspect. Didn't mess with markings though, didn't want to get into that area of trouble. Whew! 49 images! Dang!

It's fun trying to get pirate themed (or at least semi-weaworthy) stuff to focus on aspects of the sins. Pride was easy, military is loaded with pride/honor. Tyler easily fits into Pride, he does get huffy about insults to his family. And murderous to anyone hurting his family. Sloth, just got sloppy. Evan makes a good Sloth, though he doesn't want to admit it. He'd never be able to move if he got a Gameboy and we all know it. :P Wrath, Clint, ANGRY FRENCHMAN. Dig the hat. He's known for eating everything, so I tried to rip up the feather at the end and the ends of his clothes. Clint is very much Wrath, if you know him you know it. As for Gluttony over there, that was hard to come up with. Adam is just a plain guy, so I guess enjoying life over doing much work can count as gluttony. He gets some fancy, and apologies for making him short. Again. And those questioning, Tyler is a wolf/jaguar hybrid, Evan is a grizzly bear, Clint is a raccoon, and Adam is a species of bird I made up based on his screenname. :D Also, the symbols from the previous entry with Lust have been implemented here. Symbols are fun, like signatures of doom.

Margarita FTW. Yes, the members of our tightest-knit group have assigned ourselves as the seven drunken pirates of the seven deadly sins. I'm lust, not just because I'm female but because I have huge sexual desire, as well as having a very passionate obsession with music. I should probably tweak it and get some headphones in there to pull that point out. Symbols were me just messing around. I know I have the list wrong, because I was all "Vanity, DUH" so I have to rearrange it and get it right. ^_^; Tyler's Pride, Clint is Wrath, I'm Lust, and Adam is Gluttony. Evan doesn't know what he wants because he's so afraid to admit he's Sloth. :P Have two slots open, because I persobnally think that only the people we'll still have close should be on it. It's not all willy nilly. And in other news, Photobucket is a bitch. I'd really like it if Ryan's server would work. :|

Lots of interpretations from myself. Started as a vent pic, then I attached a lot of meanings and it all worked out pretty darn well. Feel better, muchly. Personally, this is the best between interpretation of feral and anthro I've seen. My skill isn't so high, but most I've seen has leaned heavily to one or the other. This is nice and right inbetween. Fur self, encompasing rage. It's not real blood, they're markings that look quite like blood. It's on purpose. there isn't much that isn't. All the little bits have meaning, but no one wants to hear me drabble on about that. If you ask, I will tell. With shading, tried out something different. Kept the two images seperate because you can't see the change in color on the stitches in this one. I really liked how I did the stitches, it's annoying how people just do black lines normally. And yeah, I like it. The shaded sketch is nice on it's own, but you don't get that. Na na na-na na!

Connection running, It's fun to work with her rediculous leg joints. She and I both didn't want to remain in a sour mood, so she jumped in with a bunch of ideas. Being sketchbook-less, I had to use a sheet of printer paper I had just bought a sheaf of. Her head still looks odd to me, I might have it too big, but it seems too feline-like for her. She's an ambiguous alien, dangit. D: Currently, I'm sloppily coloring it with my mouse. Edit: Yaaay, sloppy and test-ful. No one wants a gi-mondo explanations for all the wierd bits, so I shant splurge atcha. It's an alien world that... needs more deffinition by me. Like a name even. Not exactly your typical 'vent picture'.

Muzzle Nuzzle. Ahh, yes it's mushy. But I'm really happy with it. The actual thing is less than 5 inches tall. Makes me happy when I look at it. Did it today in Philosophy in Current Events, obviously I was not paying attention. Tyler's markings and fur are all F'd up because of his contradicting hybrid species (Wolf and Panther) but I _really_ like drawing him like that, it actually works! And I have my fur self's markings change all the time, you may recognize them from Blue Light. You know the best part about this picture? The whole reason I wanted to do it in the first place? MUZZLES! ZOMG, the muzzles worked in the pose I wanted them to! This makes me so happy! WOOO0!!1 Ok, I'm done :3

I wanted to feel proud of something so I could get back to work studying. Alex the Cat, had a "slap wings on it" urge for the big image in the back, but my commitee (Tyler and Ryan :P) said it looked better without. Happy things happen in wallpapers, I like doing them with art I'm done with. Great since this computer can process such huge images now. Wootburgers. Still like this song. Yup. *nod*

Little banner idea for what Evan and I hope to do for Haloween. Could put the banner on the top of a sign up sheet for more ninjas and pirates. Smaller images can be used for buttons if we get a button-maker. Obviously this is really loose. I'll work on better lettering if I make a final copy. Still crap at drawing guns :D

Nerf.. Just haven't had a good day today. Mini-comic showing a bit of the Breakers. Not quite sure why, but I think I got the idea down ok. Thrown together, so I don't think it makes much sense on it's own. Played around with trying to do a comic with a touch of perspective and interaction, but mostly for poses sake so the quality isn't up to snuff. Pose sketch of my cat-self, running forward. Perspective is a bitch with hands. And I was running around my floor to make my bell tinkle and it was fun, kinda wanted to catch that emotion. These are what my sketchs look like when I'm all mentally off and don't have music available. Craptacular crap. Slate and Vienle. Vienle looks half-decent, but nyeh. And some harder 'emo' stuff. No, the picture of Evan-bear has nothing to do with my being upset, it was something he did and I wanted to do it for the comic I hope to piece together sometime. The 'lyrics' there aren't from a song. Oftentimes I'll piece what's bothering me into a few condensed words. Desusional hope that maybe I could use them as lyrics if I get to making my own music. The eye and tattoo was me just letting my pencil make shapes. Little doodle to the right is how I feel a lot of the time, when my friends are upset I'm the excessive-emotional sponge. (But I would never wish otherwise, I live to help people. It just prevents me from being really happy until they get through.) Yeah... Doesn't mean crap in the long run, but I'm trying to shoo off whatever gets on my chest as soon as it gets there.

Edit: Server's back up. As stated, a much better sketch of the trade I would like to do with Trecheon. Upped the contrast and stuff in PSP8, just to make all the sketch lines obvious. The difficult part about this one is the perspective, it's supposed to be a low perspective. When I tried making the legs look longer it just kind of absorbed into the looseness that Sonic style is. Also, I'm still shit at drawing guns, but they look ok like that. Some of the details I tried to work in were making it look like he isn't -completely- badass, and that he had to fight to get whovever it was down. Black eye, bruised cheek. Didn't want to tear or cut the pants, because in reality those wouldn't have an effect like that in a fist fight. His bangs are all roughed up, and a bit of his spines too. I may try to get dirt or little stones stuck between spine fibers, that would look good. I'm curious if anyone has any insight for putting a dirt look on the pants. or how to adjust the ground/background to help with the perspective.

Ha ha, I'm fidgity in class. Happy looking Zell, kind of Gunman in idea didn't come though. Too few details cept in injuries and song stuff. Zell's eye. Gunman!Vienle hating on herself, 'cause she does that to convince herself she's not insane. Little pose sketch of a fetal position for Gunman!Vienle too. Gunman!Vienle, as a wee tot with her dad. AND ZOIP! ~Thanks for watching
